about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the indie MMORPG, Rebellion Against Rebellion! Explore the world of magic and mystique, where magical crystals shape your destiny. Acquire magical abilities, collect characters and pets during epic adventures! Join now and be part of an uplifting, enchanting journey!

Players will unravel the game's story and events through missions. The narrative begins in the distant past, gradually approaching the present. It revolves around a young boy who becomes ensnared by the power of dark magic. His actions, in turn, incur the wrath of seven titans. Mistakes he makes jeopardize his life. However, it's crucial to remember that this young boy will later become the dark mage whom players must confront in a later stage of the game.

After overcoming an enemy you can gain its form or a pet. You can play with learned characters and switch shapes at any time. Pets need to be developed individually, assisting you in battles during your adventures.

You'll have the opportunity to trade with other players in the auction house. Manufactured characters, pets, and materials can be sold. Gold acquired in the game can be used for purchases or tried at dice poker for luck.

You can form a Guild with your friends to participate in the game as a team. We have eliminated World XP in the game. XP necessary for progression can be obtained by completing missions, learning characters, and pets.

You can build on your own territory, limited only by your imagination. Choose from over 400 building elements that you can craft. You can showcase your built empire to your friends within the game. You just need to be in the same party.

Magical crystals and essences dominate the entire game. Acquiring them allows you to craft items or enhance your power. During adventures, you can enter random dungeons or face massive challenges in PVP grounds.

The demo version of the Rebellion Against Rebellion game. It provides an opportunity to try out the game. Some features in the game are restricted. Restrictions: auction house, player-to-player trading, chat panel usage, and story questlines.

The data of characters created in the demo version will be wiped during the planned weekly server restarts.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
